title: The Boy Next Door
author: ScribblerMia (Mia Cortez)
genre: Fiction, Romance, New Adult / Young Adult
description: A romance story originally published on Wattpad by ScribblerMia (Mia Cortez). It follows the rekindled relationship between childhood friends — now college students — as they navigate love, friendship, heartbreak, and second chances in a university setting. The story explores themes of trust, growth, forgiveness, and the complexities of young love.
